code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='https://tranquil-sands-81334.herokuapp.com/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){console.log("P\xE4ivitet\xE4\xE4n id ".concat(id," osoitteessa \"").concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id,"\""));var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deletePerson=function deletePerson(id){console.log("Poistetaan id ".concat(id," osoitteessa \"").concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id,"\""));var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,deletePerson:deletePerson};
